title: Take Up Your Cross - Part 1
description: He was the one who came down for heaven and gave us the perfect example of how we are to live! His word says HE seeks for a man to stand in the gap.

title: Take Up Your Cross - Part 2
description: Unless we experience holiness in everything we do we will never see and hear from the Lord of glory. The Father says that as He sent his Son Jesus so He also sends us â€“ His disciples. A few applications are given to us that will help us and encourage us to live for eternity and forsake the love of ourselves and this world. We can impact eternity right where we are atâ€¦so will we?
